summary: This is a New York City Police Department Sex Offender Monitoring Unit (SOMU) registration record for Jeffrey Epstein, executed on December 10, 2018. It contains his personal details, registration history, and a reference to his 2006 arrest and 2008 conviction for a crime involving a 14-year-old female victim.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was a registered sex offender with the NYPD Sex Offender Monitoring Unit (SOMU) with Registration Date April 15, 2010.
The document records an arrest date of July 23, 2006, and a conviction date of June 30, 2008, for Jeffrey Epstein.
The crime associated with the conviction involved a 14-year-old female victim, as indicated in the 'Victim Age' and 'Victim Sex' fields.
This is an official NYPD administrative record documenting Epstein's status as a monitored sex offender in New York City as of December 2018.
